        Instantiates the ROCCalculator.
        Parameters:
        curves - the score column of the curves
        classCol - the class column
        maxPoints - the maximum number of points to put into the calculated ROC curves
        posClass - the the positive class

                        throws CanceledExecutionException
        Calculates the ROC curve.
        Parameters:
        table - the table with the data
        exec - the execution context to use for reporting progress
